pages.text: $(li)The Flower is a decorative block that can contain flowers, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bamboo)Bamboo$(/l), saplings, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cactus)Cactus$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/red_mushroom)Red Mushrooms$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brown_mushroom)Brown Mushrooms$(/l), and other plants.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/ceramist)Ceramists$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by a flower pot.
